explanation: [0-0] On a sunny afternoon, with lush greenery along the street, a boy in a blue jacket and blue sweatpants is walking on the sidewalk with his head up, one hand extending from the right side of the screen making a heart gesture.

[0-8] The boy walks forward, sees the hand, squats down in confusion, and imitates the heart gesture. He first clenches his hand and extends it to the side of the heart-making hand, gets his hand hit by the heart-making hand, then extends his hand again, gets hit again, and gets hit even after making a peace sign.

[8-17] Then the scene changes to a little girl in a pink princess dress and blue wings, standing angrily on the sidewalk, she flicks her hand and walks back. The scene cuts back to the boy, who is squatting on the sidewalk, seriously gesturing, trying to make another heart shape. After multiple attempts, the boy finally succeeds in making the standard heart gesture and smiles happily.

[17-23] Then the scene changes to the little boy getting up and chasing after the little girl, making a heart gesture with his hand. After stopping the girl, he stands by a bench. The man makes a finger-heart gesture with one hand. The girl sees it, reaches out her hand to make a heart gesture and overlaps with him. The girl smiles happily, a pink heart appears between their hands, the camera zooms in, and the picture is full of warmth and love.
